sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>scooter</radical> gave you a <radical>splinter</radical>, so you had to go in for <kanji>treatment</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine how bad a scooter splinter would be! You would need special treatment for that.
readingMnemonic: After you get <kanji>treatment</kanji>, you feel really <reading>goo</reading>d (<ja>ぐう</ja>).
readingInfo: Not just "good," but "goooooood." Emphasize the long vowel for the long vowel in <ja>ぐう</ja>. You feel this way because when you went in for treatment, they gave you the good, good drugs. You know the ones.
